options.content:
# M122 Nextcloud Monitoring mit $Bash

Dokummentation und Code unter: [github.com](https://github.com/Zubcal/m122/tree/main)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login successful.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by(instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login failed.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"PUT|GET" | message=~"File accessed.*|Preview accessed.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
count by (remoteAddr) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login failed.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.description: Anzahl zeilen die eine info beinhalten

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="1" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: INFO Log Zielen

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="2" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"POST|PUT|MKCOL" | message=~"File written.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"GET" | message=~".*shared.*accesse.*" | url!~".*download.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"DELETE" | message=~".*unshared.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"MOVE" | message=~"File renamed.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="3" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="4" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"GET" | message=~".*shared.*accesse.*" | url=~".*download.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"DELETE" | message=~"File deleted.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"POST" | message=~".*shared.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (instance) (bytes_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (user) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login successful.*" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="1" | line_format "➡️❕ IP {{.remoteAddr}} {{.method}} {{.url }} with ? {{.user}} ? {{.message }} "
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="2" | line_format "➡️⚠️ IP {{.remoteAddr}} {{.method}} {{.url }} with ? {{.user}} ? {{.message }} "
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="3" | line_format "➡️? IP {{.remoteAddr}} {{.method}} {{.url }} with ? {{.user}} ? {{.message }} "
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | level="4" | line_format "➡️☠️ IP {{.remoteAddr}} {{.method}} {{.url }} with ? {{.user}} ? {{.message }} "

sum by (username) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login failed.*" | pattern `<_>Login failed: <username> (Remote IP: <_>` | __error__="" [$__interval]))
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login successful.*" | __error__=""
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | message=~"Login failed.*" | pattern `<_>Login failed: <username> (Remote IP: <_>` | __error__=""

{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | method=~"PUT|GET" | message=~"File accessed.*|Preview accessed.*" | pattern `<_>File accessed: \"<accessed_file>\""<_>` | __error__=""
